comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_6_8) AppleWebKit/535.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/13.0.782.41 Safari/535.1

Steps to reproduce:

Fetching messages over IMAP and opened the Activity Manager


Actual results:

The progress bars are either not filled or their filled degree does not reflect the progress they should indicate properly.  Eg. Downloading 416/598 will have an empty or 5% filled progress bar.


Expected results:

The progress bars should adequately represent the progress of the task.
comments.text:
Created attachment 543353
Activity Manager

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_6_8) AppleWebKit/535.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/13.0.782.41 Safari/535.1

Steps to reproduce:

Fetching messages over IMAP and opened the Activity Manager


Actual results:

The progress bars are either not filled or their filled degree does not reflect the progress they should indicate properly.  Eg. Downloading 416/598 will have an empty or 5% filled progress bar.


Expected results:

The progress bars should adequately represent the progress of the task.
